name: Beetroot
properties: Featured in traditional soups like borscht
benefits: Beetroot is the star of borscht soup and provides powerful anti-inflammatory benefits. Rich in natural nitrates that support circulation and cardiovascular health. The fiber and nutrients make it excellent for weight management when prepared without added fats.
amount: 3 beetroot chopped per 4 servings of soup

quotes: Beetroot may be the star of this soup, but there are a lot of supporting players, from cabbage to parsnips, and a seasoning of fresh dill and a splash of vinegar brighten the flavour.
